name: Fear Coefficient
description:
You are alone, monsters are coming, and your life is at the mercy of three simple dices. Each time you take a hit the dice will roll once again.  Strength is how many times you need to click an enemy for him to die. Fear is how fast they spawn. Light is well light.

  • ZQSD/WASD to move 
  • Left click to shoot
  • R to Restart

This game was made in 3 days for the Mini Jam #83 where the theme was : Dread and I had to make dice a mechanic. I don't think I implemented well the dice mechanic because they stated it can't be a random number generator but I don't care because I learnt a lot about Godot in those 3 days and overall I like it.
